title: Dompet with Pomegranate and Mango Designs Beaded purse with pomegranate and mango designs

physical_appearance:This is a beaded purse in a semicircular shape. It is made from red velvet
 and decorated with embroided beads and stitching. There is a bead button at the bottom-center
 holding the flap closed. The purse is decorated with floral motifs. In the center
 there is a beaded design of a pomegranate
 surrounded by flowers.
subject_terms_1:beadwork (visual works) plant-derived motifs pouches
subject_terms_2:Beadwork Motifs Pouches (Containers)
subject_terms_3:Decorative arts
sgcool_label_text:This dompet has a unique semi-circular shape quite unlike other envelope purses. The front flap is adorned with a fully beaded bouquet of flowers and what is possibly a pomegranate
 a symbol of fertility. The flap opens to reveal a cluster of flowers and mango fruits. This dompet is also embroidered with gold thread in a style known as tekad timbol.  Tekad timbol was not only practised by the Peranakans but also by the Malays
 for whom it was better known as tekat.

metadata.title_text: Dompet with Pomegranate and Mango Designs Beaded purse with pomegranate and mango designs
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a beaded purse in a semicircular shape. It is made from red velvet, and decorated with embroided beads and stitching. There is a bead button at the bottom-center, holding the flap closed. The purse is decorated with floral motifs. In the center, there is a beaded design of a pomegranate, surrounded by flowers.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This dompet has a unique semi-circular shape quite unlike other envelope purses. The front flap is adorned with a fully beaded bouquet of flowers and what is possibly a pomegranate, a symbol of fertility. The flap opens to reveal a cluster of flowers and mango fruits. This dompet is also embroidered with gold thread in a style known as tekad timbol.  Tekad timbol was not only practised by the Peranakans but also by the Malays, for whom it was better known as tekat.
